install.title: Could not detect metamask
install.description: To use ProofIt! you need to install Metamask first. Click the button below and follow the instructions to install it.

assets.no_assets: Sorry! You do not own any assets yet. Click the "Create asset" button to create a new asset!

errorModal.filebaseError: Could not comminucate with Filebase. Please try again later.
errorModal.assetExists: Could not create new asset. Asset with this data already exists!
errorModal.unknownError: Could not create asset. Unkown error occured. Please try again later!
errorModal.title: Oh no! Something went wrong..
errorModal.errFormat: Could not create asset: {0} [-> Error Code: {1}]

successModal.title: Yeah! Asset successfully created!
successModal.content: It can take several minutes until your asset is visible in the list as the transaction is processed.

acceptModal.title: Are you sure?
acceptModal.content:
Are you sure you want to create this asset?
This action cannot be undone.
After clicking OK a MetaMask popup should appear where you have to accept the transaction again!

detail.errGeneric: Could not load asset. Please try again later.

states.confirm: Waiting for you to confirm the transaction in metamask
Waiting for you to confirm the transaction in metamask

verificationQR.title: Verification QR
verificationQR.explanation: Show this QR Code to someone else to proof ownership of this asset.

qr.headline: Scan QR Code
qr.text: Please scan the QR code provided by the other party

fileUpload.error: Something went wrong while trying to decode QR-Code. Did you upload the correct QR-Code? Please try again later!

texts.secure: Ownership verified! User also created a verification for your address! This signature can be trusted! Make sure to double check the assetID
texts.warn: Ownership verified! User did not create a verification for your address. Please ask the user to create a verification for you to be 100% safe!
texts.error: Could not verify ownership. This QR Code should NOT be trusted be careful - possible FRAUD detected
